storyInfo: Heavyrain, in a rush, collapses on the border of Minos. Upon awakening, she meets a Minoan priestess, 'Pallas'.

attributes.content: This place will no longer shelter you.
Begone, dear warrior. Turn about and flee. Your pitiful destiny is already set in stone. You have no place in this world any longer.
Indeed, your existence has no meaning for us anymore.
......Thus, the warrior fled. She, who never once trembled in fear under the thundering of the enemy's drums, who never faltered against the roars of her cruel opponents, turned and ran.
Akroti, a region in Minos bordering Sargon, comprised of many villages
Days of unending rain would sicken even the most tenacious of young warriors.
Not to mention this pitiable fellow, sunken to the darkest depths of despair.
What sort of experiences would have forced her to leave her home at such a young age?
What happened to her, such that her heart would ache in sadness whenever she looks back at her homeland?
She wishes no one to know.
Go on, flee. Head to that unknown land.
Yet——
What's the situation?
Just stopped moving. She's been struggling there for two hours already, moved about ten meters since we found her.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: If she really was a competent spy, she'd be playing dead to conserve her energy instead of drawing our attention like this.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: It could also all be an act, to play on the Minoans' sympathy and lower their guard.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Yes, the Minoans would have trouble ignoring such a weight on the conscience. What do you think of this foreign warrior, and what she's done?
Hmph, just a trick.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: She's definitely acting. You know it's Sargon's fault, their tricks and lies, that these villages took so long to...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: That's a different conversation. I want you to take a closer look at her. Set aside your suspicions and look at her, see her innocence.
I appreciate your concern for the villagers' safety.....
(Sneer)
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Whether it comes from a good place or not. You need only tell me, warriors of Sarkaz, how fares the outsider now?
In short, she's at death's door.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Looks like she was crossing over from Sargon, judging by her weapon and equipment. Now, she just looks like a fish out of water, struggling helplessly on Minoan soil.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Is she alone?
So far, she is... Though that might change later.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Hmm, if that's the case...
Hey, Priestess, 'Pallas'.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: It's not my job to say what's what, but since the Minoans hired me and appointed you to take command, I'll just remind you—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: You're not a normal nurse, but neither are you a naive priestess who knows nothing but sympathy and forgiveness.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: You're the commander of the Minoans, mentor to the budding warriors, the so-called 'Goddess' worshipped by all these Minoan villages.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: If you take her in, everyone must treat her with the same amount of respect and devotion that they give to you. After all, you were the one who found her.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Yet this little warrior is, without the slightest hint of doubt, of Sargon——
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Until there is peace with Sargon, she remains an enemy to Minoans, one they have to stay wary of.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Warrior, your words carry your intentions well, and reveal the breadth of your knowledge. I listen out of respect and duty.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: But as you know, there exists a divide between your judgment and mine. It is a saddening reality, but it is one we must face.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: I am indeed considering taking her in, and treating her wounds at the least.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Hers is a young life, one hanging by a thread. And I believe she means us no harm.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: As for whether thousands of Sargon's soldiers lurk behind her shadow, that is for you to determine.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: In the absence of danger, we may not fall upon the ongoing war as an excuse to abandon another's life.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: (How pointless.)
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Some may think this a pointless act. That is why I let the others return to their duties, while you remain here, watching over her.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Sarkaz, oh poor Sarkaz. Your callous demeanor is known far and wide, and you rely on it for survival. In other words, many among you take pride in your indifference.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: One must heel to one's proficiencies. I give my orders based on this principle.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: You need only ensure your mission is completed. As for other matters... they will be resolved, one way or the other.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Since you refuse to change your mind even after listening to me, wouldn't it be the same if someone else was looking after her?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: You've been working as a mercenary here for three months now. I'm sure you're aware of the situation.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: If it were left to the Minoans, this would be over in ten minutes, much less two hours. Their guilt would gnaw at those pure hearts of theirs, bidding them to lend a hand, regardless of the danger...
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: In such a scenario, how badly shaken would those sincere hearts of theirs be, if that betrayal really came to fruition?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Hah. In the end, even you admit that those villagers are way too soft-hearted, to value the life of a potential enemy.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I understand you, Sarkaz. Some of the villagers have accepted you, and the elders view you as one of our own. You have their goodwill to thank for that.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: However, your needs do not lay there. Between love, or at least this love that exists between we of different races, and the payment of money that you receive, you do not believe that it is worthless.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: There's nothing to discuss about that.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: You live life your own way, and I have never questioned that.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: But I think that Sarkaz demeanor I mentioned——perhaps you were like that, once. When we first met, you harbored a kindness not altogether pure, and a heart not completely vile.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Yet, that has changed. Your interactions with the Minoan soldiers and the villagers have spurred your thoughts. You have become an intelligent warrior brandishing your weapon of your own free will.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Your vigilance is warranted. It's just that I believe Sargon has no reason to attack right now, and neither is there a need to use such crude 'bait.'
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Rather than formulating a trap to prey on others' kindness, the Sargon's troops would be far more willing to march in brashly, declaring their cruel intentions to plunder and slaughter for all to hear.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Right, right. Let's just go with what you said.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: For now, let us turn our eyes to this young warrior who's wandered over from Sargon.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Just as you said, though I wish to save her...
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Just as you warned, it would be far from prudent to simply bring her back to the villages.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: She has no visibly open wounds, and it does not seem to be any complex disease that would require surgery.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: I will attempt to treat her wounds. The consequences of this will be mine to bear.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: You mean you want me to put up a tent here, so you can treat her wounds? In this place not even two kilometers from the border? Even the garrison is farther away!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Well, there's not much difference with the garrison anyway...
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Don't forget your place. You're the villagers' beacon of hope, the one who will free them from the threat of Sargon.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: They love you, and call you the 'Goddess of Victory', yet here you are taking such risks...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Watch your words, soldier.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: ...Tch.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: A young woman whose guilt is yet unproven, who has waited for over two hours, struggling to keep herself awake, all for the sake of survival.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: She has already passed your test——As the keenest and most vigilant Sarkaz, you are unable to bring out solid evidence of her duplicity.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: And so, my heart is already filled with guilt. I cannot bear to leave her any longer.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: I don't object, if you really insist on it. But... it's hard to say if that girl will even talk to you like this after she wakes up.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Just be prepared for an attack once she wakes up.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: At this moment, the young Sargon warrior is suffering in her dreams.
She drags her body onward with naught but sheer determination, but in the end her vision disappears in a fog of darkness.
As she loses herself within the rest that has long eluded her, she is wrapped in a blanket of warmth. Yet, this warmth is unfamiliar to her, and she remains vigilant even in her dreams.
Thus, she escapes from her dreamland, escapes the trap of comfort, escapes the warm touch on her skin.
Ah. You're awake?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Calm down. You've been sleeping for quite a long time...
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: The Kuranta soldier immediately rises, swiftly inspecting her surroundings.
The narrow space contains only herself, the Forte woman and some scattered items.
...I understand. You're looking for your weapon, yes? Here it is.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: The Kuranta soldier snatches the weapon. With seemingly no hesitation, she swings the flail towards the Forte.
The narrow space limits her movement. The weapon catches on the surrounding canvas, making a dull thud.
The Forte woman remains at the bedside, without a trace of surprise on her face.
Decisive and orderly moves. Mystery woman, I can tell you are a well-trained soldier, confident in your own strength.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Unfortunately, this place is not fit for combat.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Answer my questions, and do nothing else, or my flail and shield will smash you... *cough*
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Alright, alright. I shall do naught but answer your questions, till you're satisfied.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Where are we?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: In my tent. To treat your injuries, a place of rest is needed.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Save it! Where is this tent? Who else is here?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Our soldiers, Minoans.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: (Al'ama, how did I end up with the Minoans?)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: You arrived from Sargon, collapsing on the Minoan side of the border. When the soldiers found you, you were still determinedly inching forward.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: This is... Minoan land?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: I've packed your possessions, they're by your feet.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: You must have been extremely hungry and tired, not being aware that your compass had malfunctioned as you struggled to make your way here and that all your navigation equipment was damaged.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: As you can hear, there are only Minos soldiers outside. You are alone, and it would be unwise to force a discussion using violence.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: This would depend on the manner in which you wish to leave this tent. We may come to an agreement and you can leave this tent assured of your safety. You may also refuse to negotiate and leave immediately, foolish as that may be.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Can you prove that?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: I am a priestess. The villagers and soldiers will follow my orders, out of respect to their faith.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: I know well enough to know none of that is true.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: This place is in the midst of a war with the tribes of Sargon. If your home isn't far from here, you should have heard of this.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: We are... near Akroti?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Absolutely.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Well then, visitor of Sargon. How may I address you?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Don't ask.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Oh? This is a rather unfair exchange then, at least in regards to me.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: The Kuranta soldier furrows her brows, as if trying to clear her thoughts and scrutinize her situation.
Just now, you said that after I fainted on Minoan land, you'd been treating my injuries all this while?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Compared to the cold interrogation you would face with the soldiers, there may at least be a chance to come to an agreement with me instead.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: An agreement?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: An agreement with you, young Sargon soldier.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Appearing suddenly by the border, hungry and disheveled, with no trace of any pursuit. I had come to the conclusion that, perhaps, you were not, in fact, an enemy at all.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: I recall that the lord ameer here doesn't have a particularly good reputation.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: The war is between you and them, don't drag me into it. I'm just passing through.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Aha, as I thought! In that case, pray lower your weapon, innocent one. I wish for a conversation between equals here, at least until I have fully expressed my sincerity.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: You... You're pretty hard to understand, with the way you speak.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Oh? The warriors complain about it from time to time, but it has never been my intention. In fact, I used to be called the most approachable priestess in the Hall of Heroes...
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: In any case, I don't want to meet your soldiers, officers, or anyone really. I'm no longer in service to Sargon anyway.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: I just want to leave, quickly. I don't really care about anything else.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Alright, alright. If so...
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Hmm.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Innocent warrior, young as you are, you have bravely traversed the dense forest to arrive here. Will you not lay down your weapon and have some food?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: I'm fine... Ugh...!
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Don't waste your energy standing up. You need not worry, for I am the village's priestess, and will only be helping to treat your wounds here.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Until we come to an acceptable agreement and leave this tent, neither I nor those outside will act against you.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: I've already said that there's nothing to discuss.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (I can't bear it, I'm too hungry...)
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Please sate your hunger, unnamed traveler. Though your weapon remains pristine, your body is overly taxed. It would be unbearable to one such as you, who trains strictly in the path of the warrior.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: You may not have had much interaction with Minoans prior, or you may have merely heard rumors. In Minos, our soldiers take neither a single step forwards nor backwards until ordered.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: I do request your understanding, as some precautions still need to be taken against you during this period of wartime. It's just that the Minoan soldiers are all extremely polite...
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Why'd you save me then?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: It's probably an ingrained virtue, as we sometimes allow objective and rational decisions to accommodate kindness still.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Then, what is that weapon there for?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Ah... Yes, you wield a similar weapon to mine, of course you would notice.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: I knew it...!
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: No, please allow me to explain. Firstly, innocent guest, your weapon appears to be of exceptional craftsmanship. I believe it is the work of an esteemed Sargon craftsman.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: You must have cherished and trained with it often, so, please look... I believe you can determine how this weapon of mine has been used, or perhaps how proficient I really am.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: You see, just as you harbor suspicion towards me, so too did I doubt your identity.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: But, just look at you now! Your deep exhaustion is etched on your face, and both your equipment and supplies have been run as ragged as you are.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Most importantly, your weapon shows no signs of recent damage. You have not been in a battle for quite some time. Based on this, I have no reason to fear you.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: So in the end... we're still gonna fight.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Oh, definitely not! I will not be using that as a bargaining chip in our discussion. In fact, I will lay my own weapon on the floor.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Observe! Dear traveler from Sargon, please feel free to partake in this nutritious food. I am fully convinced that you are unrelated to our true enemies.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: In consideration to your current state, this free and delicious meal should not be left for too long, regardless of any choice you may make later on.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Oh, finally out huh.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Sarkaz...
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: What, my horns alone enough to scare you?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: You...!
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: That look of fear and disgust... I've been judged at a glance too damned many times.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I seek your forgiveness, brave warrior. Your existence is not at fault.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Hmph, I'm sure you think so, priestess. But what about her? She won't listen to you.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I... Priestess, you said that there were Minoans standing guard outside.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: They went for lunch a while time ago. They'll probably be drinking wine, singing and reciting poetry right after too, so they got me to help stand guard here.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Ah, it appears that my admonishments were still not taken seriously. I had wanted to show you the magnanimity of the Minoan soldiers...
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Probably better this way.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: I'll be leaving immediately. I don't want to loiter around your battlefield.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Oh? Are you leaving now, fearless traveler?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: The famous village of Akroti is but a stone's throw away. You might find it worth your while to pay a visit.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: E-Even if there are theaters and cinemas? There's also a really good Minoan restaurant...
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: No. Thank. You.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: *sigh* There's also our warriors' favorite baths...
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: ...Bath?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Forget it. Mixed gender bath.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: No way.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Y-You can also use the small bath reserved for the priests. For a traveler on such a long and weary journey as you, taking a well-deserved rest is...
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: I said no! I... I'm not traveling.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: It's better if I'm not seen. I have a bad feeling about this, I'm leaving.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: We're still too close to Sargon.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Ahh... But, it's so rare to see so rustic and pitiful a foreign youth...
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Ignore her. It's been a long time since she left the big city she used to live in. She's probably going insane from having to stay in this backwater for so long. It's pretty amazing you can stand that tone of hers.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: The villages of Akroti are not safe for you. If you are running from something and want to avoid trouble, you should probably leave now.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: However, foreigner, where lies your destination? To be traveling in such a harried state, could it be that you committed some unspeakable crime, or perhaps insulted an important noble?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: No, I'm just... a mercenary... and I'm free.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: My destination doesn't matter, as long as I get further away.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: To the north, and further to the east. This place... I will not survive long here.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Deserts, battlefields, Sargon... I don't want to face any of these right now.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Ah... A pitiful youth who shoulders the terrible weight of her painful past.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Please at least leave your name, so that I may pray for you, whether it be strength to face the dangers ahead or guidance to the place you may find happiness.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Are these prayers any good for people from Sargon?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Heh. I don't believe in it, for what it's worth.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: (Stomps on his foot)
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: *Hiss*... Pallas...!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: 'Pallas'?
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: (*sigh* The blame for exposing me lies with you, Sarkaz warrior.)
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: It is not a name worth remembering, at least for now.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Although, there are such stories——On the border of Minos, a priestess bears the revelations of the twelve heroes, arriving to protect the honor and freedom of the Minoans, taking up the fight against Sargon's invasions and always able to clutch victory from the jaws of defeat...
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Never heard of them.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: *cough*—*cough* *cough*... W-Well, I suppose the war has not yet been won.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Apologies, I had no intention of declaring that name. I only hope that these myths of Minos may spread to Sargon as well, such that we can come to understand each other better.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: You should save those words for the next visitor from Sargon passing by.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: *Sniff*... Fine. It seems that besides wishing you well, there is nothing else we can do for you, traveler from Sargon.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: I will gift you this working compass.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Though you know not where you are going... You must continue moving onwards. That is the only goal you have now, and the only way to escape your suffering.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: To move onwards is a choice, one most miraculous. I believe that you will receive much help on your journey, traveler.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: When the next kindly person appears, one who can devote their energies to you, one who can save you from the most dangerous of mountains, one who can help you escape the clutches of Death... You may make your choice then, or even decide to accompany them.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Hey, watch out, priestess. What if those sufferings you just mentioned really happened to her?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: The things you say are oddly profound, at times.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Forget it... it doesn't really matter.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: Maybe the destination of this journey is the journey itself.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: I will pray for you, young lady. The road you tread stretches far, very far indeed.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: You are a warrior. A brave, persevering warrior. Your bravery is etched on your weapon, etched on your limbs, etched in your very soul itself.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Though your eyes are hazy now, a strong rain will wash it all away and your vision will be clear once more.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: I apologize for not being able to devote myself to the task of earning your trust. We all have the same, more important things to do.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: I'm still suspicious of you.
attributes.name: Heavyrain

attributes.content: You, me, and that adorable Sarkaz warrior. We are all on a journey without a destination, struggling and suffering to move onwards for the sake of our souls, even as we seek that one thing we must experience, that most important thing——
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: To find a place for ourselves.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Hey, time to change shifts.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Right.
attributes.name: Minoan Soldier

attributes.content: Hey, Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Minoan Soldier

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Shouldn't you tell us your name by now? Or do you really want to go by 'Sarkaz'?
attributes.name: Minoan Soldier

attributes.content: A name's just a name. You call your priestess 'Goddess'. She calls herself 'Priestess Pallas'. Does that really make her so?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Whatever. Though, after we win this war, the only name you'll be leaving to the legends would be 'Sarkaz' then?
attributes.name: Minoan Soldier

attributes.content: Hah, let's see if we even survive! You're pretty confident, Minoan!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: (It's not really important whether I'm hailed as a hero in history.)
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: (As long as I'm a Sarkaz, as long as I'm treated as a Sarkaz no matter what I do...... It's not too bad to be fighting alongside heroes.)
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Priestess Pallas, what are you doing here?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Ah, Mister Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Don't call me that. Why are you standing night watch? Did something happen?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Not something to mobilize the masses, I hope.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: It's just that today's events have been weighing heavily on me. I have had an urge to come here, to find the answers I seek.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: What, are you still thinking about that Sargon Kuranta soldier? What's so special about her?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: No, it's exactly the opposite. She's normal through and through.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: She's normal, yet she hurries along, as if running away from some evil spirit while keeping everyone at arm's length.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: She does not seem predisposed to such behavior. I would presume that a great change has occurred recently, one that has left her despondent.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Mister Sarkaz, what do you think could have happened?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: No idea. I don't share your interest in going through people's life stories.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I only need to know what you're doing here. You act as if you want me to do something, while also looking like you're just loitering around. Tell me what's on your mind, mercurial 'Goddess'.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Shh.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: (Grabs his blade)
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Who's there?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: It's just as you said, Mister Sarkaz. It's difficult to discern one's heart, and my fateful encounter with our Kuranta visitor was sadly lacking in depth.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Even so, you and I have witnessed her fragility——Her fortitude is bent and broken, and she is at her most vulnerable right now. There isn't much we can do for her, with a good breakfast being the greatest courtesy we can confer.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Even so, even so. That poor Kuranta soldier. Her only pursuit right now, is the power to grasp her own fate. To choose a destination of her own, or to end it on her own terms.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: No matter what, she possesses the same goal as ourselves. To search for freedom, that is our mission.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Try as I may, I am unable to imagine how vile it must be, that evil spirit behind the loss of her freedom. I never believed I would face such a saddening scene.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Ah, 'Mister Sarkaz', do you weep for such a tragedy?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: As things are now, perhaps I should make my warning clear in advance, so that the approaching battle will reach a more direct conclusion——
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Malign one, you are different from the earlier traveler. Your body reeks of the stench of blood and evil. You have a cruel plan, and the target is one much weaker than you.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: You wish to carry out a murder, a hunt, a dirty plan to brag about, upon this holy land of Minos. This, I will never allow.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Without warning, a shadow leaps out of the dark night and rushes towards the Minoan priestess.
In an instant, his attack is blocked by an opposing blade.
The attacker immediately falls back.
Stand aside, my kin. This obnoxious priestess who keeps rambling on about inane topics annoys me.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Assassin

attributes.content: It seems that you didn't understand her words, which is to say you don't know why she's so unhappy right now.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: I have my own task. I believe it should have nothing to do with you.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Assassin

attributes.content: She seems to want to stop me from finding a 'Kuranta soldier.' I can see that she's been anticipating a battle since before I tracked the clues here.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Assassin

attributes.content: Since she wants to protect my target, she must die. What are you doing here then?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Assassin

attributes.content: I'm working as a soldier, helping the Minoans here.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Ah, we are not enemies then. We both have a job to do, so let's go our own ways.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Assassin

attributes.content: Is that witch's life part of your responsibilities?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Assassin

attributes.content: That's not something you need to think about.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Indeed. Every swing of my blade has a price, and I have no reason to waste my energy here.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Assassin

attributes.content: ——Unless, that absurd speech of hers has displeased me. Maybe I want to drag her horns along, to point a faster path to that Kuranta soldier.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Assassin

attributes.content: I haven't guessed wrongly, have I? Witch.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Assassin

attributes.content: What an uncultured and ill-manned beast.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: You view yourself as a dirty blade and refuse all counsel. Is that really the case?
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: *spits* That's enough. Kinsman, I have no quarrel with you. Close one eye and leave, if you know what's good for you.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Assassin

attributes.content: The assassin prepares to strike at the priestess. However, the mercenary steps in front of her, not moving an inch.
Oh, what's this? You're a Sarkaz, do you really think that you'll be treated as an honored bodyguard, with nothing but the blessings of the Minoans?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Assassin

attributes.content: Nothing to do with the priestess. I just think that you've lived a really sad life.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Mercenary

attributes.content: Don't tell me you've never done such things. Frankly, you're no match for me.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Assassin

attributes.content: Nay, ruthless intruder, wicked pursuer. It is because of that blind arrogance of yours that you will lose.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Heroes do not await death meekly. Moreover, heroes do not stand aside as monsters chase their prey about.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Blinded by money and power as you are, you have already forgotten how shameful it is to persecute and kill.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Whatever you say. If you really have the stuff, I'll stop after cutting off one of your horns.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Assassin

attributes.content: To be honest, I think my talents are being wasted on a simple deserter. Wouldn't I get a nicer reward if I brought back a Minoan head?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Assassin

attributes.content: Since you have cursed and insulted me so, I no longer hold the slightest bit of remorse for that devil-bewitched heart of yours.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: For the sake of that Kuranta traveler's safety, I will not let you leave alive, cruel assassin.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: Pitiful, tragic Sarkaz warriors. Your once chaotic hearts are no longer the same. You have each stepped on vastly different paths.
attributes.name: Pallas

attributes.content: There's only one ending for Sarkaz. Salvation does not exist. Just shut up, witch. Here I come——
attributes.name: Sarkaz Assassin

attributes.content: This battle in the dark night was never recorded in the annals of history.
Some souls continue running, becoming ever purer in their journey of life.
In time, they will shine with the brightest light.
In time, these sparks of light will gather about the traveling Rhodes Island, becoming a glorious blaze that moves ever onwards.
